items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.

items.content_html: A simple To-Do list application with basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, built using a Node.js/Express backend and a React frontend. The app allows users to add, complete, delete, and edit tasks. The data is stored in-memory for simplicity, making it a lightweight and easy-to-run project.
items.title: keremaras1/todo-app: A simple To-Do list application with basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, built using a Node.js/Express backend and a React frontend. The app allows users to add, complete, delete, and edit tasks. The data is stored in-memory for simplicity, making it a lightweight and easy-to-run project.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
